Protocols/URLDecoderProtocol.html#/s:14D.name: decode(type:from:decoder:)
Protocols/URLDecoderProtocol.html#/s:14D.abstract: Decodes a URLCodable object from the given URL using a provided JSONDecoder.

Protocols/URLCodable.html#/s:14DeeplinkR.name: template
Protocols/URLCodable.html#/s:14DeeplinkR.abstract: A template instance used for decoding URL query parameters.

Protocols/NavigatorProtocol.html#/topVc.name: topVc
Protocols/NavigatorProtocol.html#/topVc.abstract: The top-most view controller in the current view hierarchy.

Protocols/NavigatorProtocol.html#/topNav.name: topNavController
Protocols/NavigatorProtocol.html#/topNav.abstract: The top-most UINavigationController in the current view hierarchy.

Protocols/NavigatorProtocol.html#/findCo.name: findController(type:)
Protocols/NavigatorProtocol.html#/findCo.abstract: Finds a specific view controller type in the view controller hierarchy.

Protocols/DeeplinkRouterProtocol.html#/i.name: isActive
Protocols/DeeplinkRouterProtocol.html#/i.abstract: Indicates whether the deep link router is currently active.

Protocols/DeeplinkRouterProtocol.html#/n.name: navigator
Protocols/DeeplinkRouterProtocol.html#/n.abstract: A navigator responsible for managing navigation between view controllers.

Protocols/DeeplinkRouterProtocol.html#/h.name: handleLastDeeplink()
Protocols/DeeplinkRouterProtocol.html#/h.abstract: Handles the last unprocessed deep link, if available, asynchronously.

Protocols/DeeplinkRouterProtocol.html#/r.name: register(deeplinks:)
Protocols/DeeplinkRouterProtocol.html#/r.abstract: Registers a list of deep link types to be handled by the router.

Protocols/AnyDeeplink.html#/canHandle(de.name: canHandle(deeplink:)
Protocols/AnyDeeplink.html#/canHandle(de.abstract: Determines whether a given URL can be handled by the conforming type.

Protocols/AnyDeeplink.html#/handle(deepl.name: handle(deeplink:navigator:)
Protocols/AnyDeeplink.html#/handle(deepl.abstract: Handles the deep link and navigates to the appropriate screen.

Protocols/AnyDeeplink.html.name: AnyDeeplink
Protocols/AnyDeeplink.html.abstract: A protocol that represents a deep link handler in an application.

Protocols/DeeplinkRouterProtocol.html.name: DeeplinkRouterProtocol
Protocols/DeeplinkRouterProtocol.html.abstract: A protocol for managing and routing deep links within an application.

Protocols/NavigatorProtocol.html.name: NavigatorProtocol
Protocols/NavigatorProtocol.html.abstract: A protocol for managing and navigating through the application’s view controller hierarchy.

Protocols/URLCodable.html.name: URLCodable
Protocols/URLCodable.html.abstract: A protocol that extends Codable and provides a template instance for URL decoding.

Protocols/URLDecoderProtocol.html.name: URLDecoderProtocol
Protocols/URLDecoderProtocol.html.abstract: A protocol for decoding URLCodable objects from a URL’s query parameters.

Classes/URLDecoder.html#/s:14DeeplinkRou.name: decode(type:from:decoder:)
Classes/URLDecoder.html#/s:14DeeplinkRou.abstract: Decodes a Codable object from the given URL’s query parameters.

Classes/DeeplinkRouter.html#/isActive.name: isActive
Classes/DeeplinkRouter.html#/isActive.abstract: Indicates whether the router is currently active and capable of handling deep links.

Classes/DeeplinkRouter.html#/navigator.name: navigator
Classes/DeeplinkRouter.html#/navigator.abstract: The navigator responsible for handling view controller transitions.

Classes/DeeplinkRouter.html#/lastDeeplin.name: lastDeeplink
Classes/DeeplinkRouter.html#/lastDeeplin.abstract: The last unhandled deep link URL, if available.

Classes/DeeplinkRouter.html#/deeplinkTyp.name: deeplinkTypes
Classes/DeeplinkRouter.html#/deeplinkTyp.abstract: A list of types conforming to AnyDeeplink that the router can handle.

Classes/BaseNavigator.html#/topVc.name: topVc
Classes/BaseNavigator.html#/topVc.abstract: Returns the top-most view controller in the navigation stack.

Classes/BaseNavigator.html#/topNavContro.name: topNavController
Classes/BaseNavigator.html#/topNavContro.abstract: Returns the top-most UINavigationController in the navigation stack, if available.

Classes/BaseNavigator.html#/tabbar.name: tabbar
Classes/BaseNavigator.html#/tabbar.abstract: Returns the UITabBarController if it is the root or top-most controller.

Classes/BaseNavigator.html#/findControll.name: findController(type:)
Classes/BaseNavigator.html#/findControll.abstract: Finds a specific view controller type in the view controller hierarchy.

Classes/BaseNavigator.html#/init(window:.name: init(window:)
Classes/BaseNavigator.html#/init(window:.abstract: Initializes the navigator, optionally with a specific UIWindow.

Classes/BaseNavigator.html.name: BaseNavigator
Classes/BaseNavigator.html.abstract: A class that implements NavigatorProtocol to manage navigation and loading states within the app.

Classes/DeeplinkRouter.html.name: DeeplinkRouter
Classes/DeeplinkRouter.html.abstract: A class that manages and routes deep links within the application.

Classes/URLDecoder.html.name: URLDecoder
Classes/URLDecoder.html.abstract: A class for universally decoding Codable objects from a URL’s query parameters.
